get.summary: Get a direct link preview for a shared file

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Token of the share

get.summary: Get a preview for a shared file

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Token of the share

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: File in the share

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: Width of the preview

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Height of the preview

parameters.name: a
parameters.description: Whether to not crop the preview

parameters.name: mimeFallback
parameters.description: Whether to fallback to the mime icon if no preview is available

303.description: Redirect to the mime icon url if mimeFallback is true

post.summary: Get the info about a share

depth.description: Maximum depth to get info about

403.description: Getting share info is not allowed

get.summary: Get shares of the current user

parameters.name: shared_with_me
parameters.description: Only get shares with the current user

parameters.name: reshares
parameters.description: Only get shares by the current user and reshares

parameters.name: subfiles
parameters.description: Only get all shares in a folder

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Get shares for a specific path

parameters.name: include_tags
parameters.description: Include tags in the share

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

404.description: The folder was not found or is inaccessible

shareWith.description: The entity this should be shared with

sendPasswordByTalk.description: Send the password for the share over Talk

expireDate.description: The expiry date of the share in the user's timezone at 00:00. If $expireDate is not supplied or set to `null`, the system default will be used.

label.description: Label for the share (only used in link and email)

sendMail.description: Send a mail to the recipient

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

403.description: Creating the share is not allowed

get.summary: Get all shares relative to a file, including parent folders shares rights

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Path all shares will be relative to

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

get.summary: Get all shares that are still pending

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

get.summary: Get a specific share by id

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the share

parameters.name: include_tags
parameters.description: Include tags in the share

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

sendPasswordByTalk.description: New condition if the password should be send over Talk

publicUpload.description: New condition if public uploading is allowed

hideDownload.description: New condition if the download should be hidden

sendMail.description: if the share should be send by mail. Considering the share already exists, no mail will be send after the share is updated. You will have to use the sendMail action to send the mail.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the share

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

400.description: Share could not be updated because the requested changes are invalid

403.description: Missing permissions to update the share

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the share

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

403.description: Missing permissions to delete the share

post.summary: Send a mail notification again for a share. The mail_send option must be enabled for the given share.

password.description: the password to check against. Necessary for password protected shares.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: the share ID

parameters.name: OCS-APIRequest
parameters.description: Required to be true for the API request to pass

403.description: You are not allowed to send mail notifications

200.description: The email notification was sent successfully

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the share
